description: Gets statistics about synchronizing a data source connector.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The identifier of the data source connector.

parameters.name: IndexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index used with the data source connector.

parameters.name: StartTimeFilter
parameters.description: When specified, the synchronization jobs returned in the list are limited to jobs between the specified dates. StartTime (datetime) --- The Unix timestamp for the beginning of the time range. EndTime (datetime) --- The Unix timestamp for the end of the time range.

nested_params.name: StartTime
nested_params.description: The Unix timestamp for the beginning of the time range.

nested_params.name: EndTime
nested_params.description: The Unix timestamp for the end of the time range.

nested_items.name: History
nested_items.description: A history of synchronization jobs for the data source connector.

nested_items.name: ExecutionId
nested_items.description: A identifier for the synchronization job.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the synchronization job started.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the synchronization job completed.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The execution status of the synchronization job. When the Status field is set to SUCCEEDED, the synchronization job is done. If the status code is set to FAILED, the ErrorCode and ErrorMessage fields give you the reason for the failure.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: If the Status field is set to ERROR, the ErrorMessage field contains a description of the error that caused the synchronization to fail.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: If the Status field is set to FAILED, the ErrorCode field indicates the reason the synchronization failed.

nested_items.name: DataSourceErrorCode
nested_items.description: If the reason that the synchronization failed is due to an error with the underlying data source, this field contains a code that identifies the error.

nested_items.name: DocumentsAdded
nested_items.description: The number of documents added from the data source up to now in the data source sync.

nested_items.name: DocumentsModified
nested_items.description: The number of documents modified in the data source up to now in the data source sync run.

nested_items.name: DocumentsDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of documents deleted from the data source up to now in the data source sync run.

nested_items.name: DocumentsFailed
nested_items.description: The number of documents that failed to sync from the data source up to now in the data source sync run.

nested_items.name: DocumentsScanned
nested_items.description: The current number of documents crawled by the current sync job in the data source.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Kendra returns this token that you can use in the subsequent request to retrieve the next set of jobs.
